overview: Quinton (Mike Hartsfield, The DEATH TOILET Franchise) and Bob (Evan Jacobs, director of the original FLEAS) are two lovable losers who get more than they bargain for when a home remedy goes wrong. After injuring himself while trying to fix an ingrown toenail, Quinton becomes convinced that he needs to do a lot more “surgery” on his toe. Amidst a lot of arguing, eating and other tomfoolery, Quinton eventually decides that the best way to remedy the situation is to amputate his foot.
title: Fleas 2: Home Remedies
